about_the_game:
Discover the Art Behind Esca with the Official Artbook!

For the first time ever, dive deep into the creation of a LuN game with the official Esca artbook. This exclusive book offers a unique look at the development process, showcasing the creation of characters, environments, and more. You'll also find fascinating anecdotes and behind-the-scenes insights that reveal the creative journey.

After purchasing and installing the DLC, you’ll find the PDF [Esca-Artbook.pdf] in the Esca folder, where the rest of the game data is stored. For example, on Windows 10, this folder is typically located at:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Esca

If you're unsure where Esca is installed, simply navigate to Esca in your Steam library, right-click, and select "Properties...". Switch to the "Local files" tab, then press the "Browse local files..." button to open the folder where Esca is installed.

Unveil the artistic vision that brought Esca to life!

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC may contain content that is not suitable for all audiences or for viewing at work, including frequent violence, gore, and mature themes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need a PDF reader to access the DLC.
